welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Palos Heights, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly people, and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as United and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for major airlines such as Delta and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights for smaller airlines such as Southwest and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Gary/Chicago International Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations at Gary/Chicago International Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free wifi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare, serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Home to American Airlines and its regional partners, this terminal also serves international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal, serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal, serving a variety of international airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
